q1: How do I convert kg to pounds?
a1: Enter the value in kg, select kg as from and lb as to. 1 kg equals approximately 2.205 pounds.
a2: A stone is an imperial unit equal to 14 pounds (approximately 6.35 kg), commonly used in the UK for body weight.
a3: Milligrams, grams, kilograms, tonnes, ounces, pounds, and stones.
a4: Yes, perfect for recipe conversions with precise results.
